incidents.name: Investigating Performance Issues in Seoul, Korea

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
Cloudflare has narrowed its investigation of network performance to origin properties in Microsoft Azure from the Seoul, Korea region.

Cloudflare is investigating issues with performance issues that may be affecting some customers in the Seoul, Korea region.

We are working to analyse and mitigate this problem.  More updates to follow shortly.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

IP, ASN, geo information of some requests is not being correctly identified.
Transits via WARP for personal use cases; traffic for Cloudflare One and Zero Trust customers is not impacted.

Cloudflare is investigating issues with Cloudflare WARP.

incidents.name: Elevated 5XX errors in Dashboard and API impacting DNS

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

Cloudflare is investigating issues with the DNS APIs and Dashboard settings.

These issues do not affect the serving of cached files via the Cloudflare CDN or other security features at the Cloudflare Edge.

Customers using Cloudflare APIs or attempting to change DNS records through the Cloudflare Dashboard are impacted as requests might fail and/or errors may be displayed.
